ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Question for you druids out there ...
ygData.msgSnippet: I sort of know what you mean. Even if I m already in a group I get people sending me tells asking for a heal or a bind. They ll expect me to leave my group and
ygData.messageBody:
I sort of know what you mean. Even if I'm already in a group I get people
sending me tells asking for a heal or a bind. They'll expect me to leave my
group and go find them to bind or heal. but most people are polite about it.
If I ask for clarity or breeze I generally offer to donate or pay for said
service. Or I offer to return a buff if my buffs are good enough.
I mostly have people outside my group being polite. but when I have people
in my group they can be rather rude. Like I was grouped with his one kid
(who I later found out was only 9 yrs old) who kept saying "Heal me. HEAL
ME!" when he wasn't even halfway down and I'd already told him I was out of
mana. I had said to other people I swore he was only 10. but then his father
told me he was 9.
Personally I don't think kids that age should play EQ. Especially when they
could potentially screw things up for other people's characters.
go figure.
luv,
-Su

> /lfg on
> /ooc 55 Enchanter looking for group or partner
>
> In comes about 5 or 6 tells asking for clarity haste ect ect. But I ignore
> them for the time being and /ooc again for a group and a few more tells
come
> in for buffs again so I start responding saying I'd like to group with you
> if possible hoping to get some exp. Most of them respond with something
> along the lines of sorry I am soloing I don't think you could really help
> much anyways I do fine soloing. Errrr well you will do fine without
> clarity. Well I endure the /poke and all the other emotes that people do
to
> beg for buffs from people that couldn't help in their group, blah blah
blah.
> Finally find two rangers to group with and finally got some really good
exp
> fear kitting was a lot of fun.
>
> Anyways rambled long enough, so in closing just put them on ignore. lol
>
> Mu
> 55 Enchanter
> Tunare Server
>
> Sistily
> 55 Warrior
> Tunare Server
>
